stdyInfo.abstract: GPS locations from collared cougars in Southwestern Alberta, and nearest road information. Please see the second tab in the file for descriptive metadata

citation.biblCit: Banfield, Jeremiah E., Simone Ciuti, Charlene C. Nielsen, and Mark S. Boyce. 2020. “Cougar Roadside Habitat Selection: Incorporating Topography and Traffic.” Global Ecology and Conservation 23 (September). doi:10.1016/j.gecco.2020.e01186.
